title: Windows 7 SP1 silent unattended corporate slave edition
description:
Build from Windows 7 SP1 x64 Original Microsoft Image.

This ISO is 100% compatible with "Windows 7 USB DVD Download Tool" utility, cause its build from legit copy.

1) Installer will only ask you the Windows install destination
1) Unlocks Admin account with 9 times autologin
2) language set to English by default.
3) EULA accepted by default.
4) After Setup Finished, it runs the a script to Install:

.NET  = 4.0.0 (Client Only, 4.5.2 is a behemoth 1.2GB once extracted)
7-Zip = 9.2.0 x(64)   
Chrome = 35.0.1916.114 (all users English download)  
Pidgin = 2.10.9 (x32)
SumatraPDF = 2.5.1 (x32)
VLC = 2.1.3 (x32) (don't change its original downloaded name)
VC ++ 2008 (x32)
VC ++ 2008 (x64)
VC ++ 2010 (x32)
VC ++ 2010 (x64)
Windows 7 Loader = 2.2.2.0
Install MS Office 2007 (dont change its original name, config.xml can be moved)
Microsoft Security Essentials = 4.5.216.0
Microsoft Security Essentials Definitions = 1.175.674.0

5) Then it will do a final reboot afterwards ... Enjoy

File MDS also attached, it was named 22.ISO, cause it took 22 times to get it done.

My First release BTW, so please encourage in the comments section if you like.

I thought of making the ISO  to boot up automatically without the need of pressing anything in the keyboard, however if your booting from DVD that will cause an infinite boot loop, cause most machines are configured to boot up from DVD first.

Also i thought of making the windows installer to auto-wipe all existing partitions, and create an primary partition, with a fixed size, or can extend 
to the size of the disk, but i guess this method is more flexible, and will work for most installation.

Today Political Incorrect Quote = "And remember Israel aint really real ..."
